_header: So it befell upon a day
_description: Gospel for the Fourth Sunday after Epiphany incorrectly headed: ‘Dominica iiij post octavam Epiphie’ in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: So it bifell opon a dayAls ihesu prechid in þe way…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …His rising turned it into careAnd endles schame for euer mare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ascendente ihesu in nauiculam.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica quarta post octava Epiphanie secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 35va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.292-296.
